DOC.HEADLINE: FOR THE RECORD
DOC.TEXT: ' Monkey Trouble ' -- The review of " Monkey Trouble " in Friday ' s Calendar section characterized the production of the film as sloppy and referred to scenes in which a microphone drops into view . In fact , the version of the film shown to the reviewer was a rough cut , and was billed as such . The print of the film currently in release does not contain those scenes .
